name: Order Up! (MirrorCube, Riifushi, Naman Khurana)
description:
A game about two ambitious chefs venturing out to manage a dessert restaurant chain! Play as cute chefs in single-player or local multiplayer as you feed hungry slimes, earn more coins, and expand your business. 

Manage your many potential restaurants and keep customers happy! A colorful cast of NPCs will interact with your establishments. Make sure to keep your restaurants stocked when the critics come by! If they close down all your restaurants it's game over!

Controls 

Player 1

  • Movement:  WASD
  • Hold E to interact
  • Press E for quick-time events

Player 2

  • Movement: Arrow Keys
  • Hold P to interact
  • Press P for quick-time events

Shared

  • R to toggle Restaurant tab [or upper right button]
  • I to toggle Inventory [or upper left button]
  • Esc to Pause
  • LMB to select

Music used:

Restaurant Music:

  • Cookie: sunshine & butterflies - comfi beats
  • Souffle: last cup of coffee - comfi beats
  • Ice Cream: Retweets - natsumii
  • Cake: Heat Waves - Glass Animals (cover by Lime)
  • Creme Brulee: Mela! - Ryokuoushoku Shakai

Main Menu: Funny Rabbit - MapleStory

Outerworld: Glitzville - Paper Mario: TTYD

Game Over: The Little Doll's Dream - Ib OST
